snippet: Kevin Durant and Kevin Martin each scored 27 points, and the visiting Thunder rolled to their sixth victory in seven games, 110-95 over the Hornets on Friday.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Oklahoma City Thunder defeats New Orleans Hornets, 110-95; other basketball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Kevin Durant and Kevin Martin each scored 27 points, and the visiting Thunder rolled to their sixth victory in seven games, 110-95 over the Hornets on Friday.

headline.seo: Thunder Prevail and Rest vs. Hornets
headline.main: Thunder Prevail and Rest vs. Hornets
headline.print_headline: Thunder Prevail And Rest Vs. Hornets
